Flying
When Hoverbike Courier enters the battlefield, you may reappropriate. If you do, draw a card. [i](To reappropriate, exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)[/i]

Haste
Sacrifice Undaunted Courier: Exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.
